name: War of the Fourteen Dynasties
description:
Battle against thirteen rival dynasties across twenty war torn provinces in this challenging strategy fighter hybrid. Command your troops on the battlefield, or fight along side them as a soldier. Crush your enemies and lead your dynasty to total victory!



  • From the campaign map to the battlefield, build your armies stronger and more powerful to destroy your foes.
  • Field a variety of weapons and troop types, swordsmen, spearmen, archers, and more, to crush your enemies your way.
  • Forge veteran heroes in the fires of battle, as your troops level up and gain skill with every victory.
  • Dynamically switch in real time, between commanding your army, or controlling individual soldiers.
  • Deploy your troops in waves, and manage each platoon.
  • Lead your armies into the fray and vanquish your many foes!



  • Plan your grand strategy on the campaign map.
  • Capture valuable resources and plunder, use them build your armies bigger and stronger.
  • Build armies, conquer new frontiers, or defend yours from invading dynasties.
  • Fight in the War of the Fourteen Dynasties for dominion over all twenty provinces.
  • Explore your home base.
  • Walk the palace grounds and explore the city.
  • Join your troops in training for bonus xp, or fight in the tournament to gain wealth.

It is time for a new leader to rise. In a realm divided by war, empires will rise and fall, but the heroes legacy lives forever. Will you take your place in history, and forge a mighty empire, greater than any that came before?
